summary: This document is a fax email exchange regarding scheduling a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein. Lesley Groff informs Amanda Kirby that Epstein will not be available on October 8th and suggests rescheduling for October 10th. The correspondence highlights the coordination efforts between Groff and Kirby.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is coordinating a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein and communicates with Amanda Kirby about scheduling.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is involved in scheduling a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein and is in communication with Lesley Groff.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual for whom the meeting is being scheduled, but he is unavailable on the proposed date.

connections.description: Lesley Groff and Amanda Kirby are coordinating a meeting on behalf of Jeffrey Epstein.
Lesley Groff assists Jeffrey Epstein in scheduling meetings.
Amanda Kirby is involved in business dealings that require meetings with Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Rescheduled Meeting with Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: A meeting with Jeffrey Epstein is proposed to be rescheduled to October 10th after he is unavailable on October 8th.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl, New York, NY
keyFacts: Lesley Groff communicates with Amanda Kirby about scheduling a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.
Jeffrey Epstein is unavailable for a meeting on October 8th and suggests October 10th instead.
Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
